Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA® 2120 Hematology Analyzer Body Fluids Application
ADVIA® 2120i Hematology Analyzer Body Fluids Application
Body Fluid Application for ADVIA 2120 and ADVIA 2120i
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA 2120/2120i Body Fluids Application for enumeration of TNC and RBC in pleural, peritoneal, and peritoneal dialysis fluids using light scatter technology
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for enumeration of total nucleated cell (TNC) count and RBC count in pleural, peritoneal, and peritoneal dialysis specimens collected in K2 or K3 EDTA
